name: Hänsel and Gretel and the magic of color
name_original: Hänsel and Gretel and the magic of color
description:
The Game

Hänsel and Gretel were abandoned in the deep forest with nothing more than a lantern. Using this light they need to find their way out and get home. They will have to work together and mix colors to overcome many different obstacles.

A cooperative puzzle platformer for two players where the light of the lanterns shows the way.

The Project

We created this game as part of the Game Programming Lab at ETH. See https://gtc.inf.ethz.ch/education/game-programming-laboratory.html for more information.

Installation

On Windows

  1. Download the zip file and extract all files.
  2. Then double click on SuperHanselAndGretel.Main.exe

On Linux

  1. Download the zip and extract all files
  2. Execute the file HanselAndGretel
